metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0171 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. The existing KVM SEV API has a vulnerability that allows a non-root (host) user-level application to crash the host kernel by creating a confidential guest VM instance in AMD CPU that supports Secure Encrypted Virtualization (SEV).
